node.hospital_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
node.detail_zh: 患者獨居於柴灣興華（二）邨展興樓， 2 月 8 日起發病，她常往美輪大廈的一間佛堂， 1 月 25 日和 2 月 8 日逗留時間較長。她並無外遊紀錄。
node.detail_en: The patient lives in Chin Hing House, Hing Wah (II) Estate, Chai Wan and started developing symptoms on Feb 8. She is a frequent visitor to a Buddhist preaching hall in Maylun Apartments, 23 Shu Kuk Street, North Point. She stayed there for an extended period of time on Jan 25 and Feb 8. She has no recent travel history.
node.classification_zh: 可能本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.description_zh: 「福慧精舍」佛堂位於北角美輪大廈，相關患者包括佛堂工作人員及善信。「福慧精舍」是本港第三宗超級傳播事件。福群組患者中，最早病發日期是 2 月 8 日。
groups.description_en: "Fook Wai Ching She" is a Buddhist preaching hall located in Maylun Apartments, North Point. Related infected patients include staff members and followers. This is the third case of super-spreader. The case was first discovered on Feb 8.

node.location_zh: 書局街 1-25 號美輪大廈福慧精舍
node.location_en: Fook Wai Ching She, Maylun Apartments, 1-25 Shu Kuk Street
node.remarks_zh: 患者一直頻密地去佛堂
node.remarks_en: The patient went to preaching hall frequently

node.location_en: Chin Hing House, Hing Wah (II) Estate
